title: A Violent Prosecutor - Geomsawejeon [2016 - South Korea]
description:
A Violent Prosecutor (2016 - South Korea)         Geomsawejeon         ê²€ì‚¬ì™¸ì „

Crime
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt5442308/


Prosecutor Jae-wook specializes in violent crimes and detests criminals and doesn't give a damn about their human rights. One day while interrogating Jin-seok, a suspect, Jae-wook loses his temper and beats him. The next morning when Jae-wook returns to the interrogation room he finds Jin-seok dead and he is then charged with murder and arrested. The Prosecutors' Office, including Jae-wook's boss and close colleagues, desperately try to find a way out of this trouble by leaving him as the scapegoat.
